p: We performed a 5-year prospective follow-up study on patients from the Transplant Center after transplantation of organs donated by 14 stroke patients with a diagnosis of brain death in our adult neurocritical care unit (subarachnoid haemorrhage 7, intracerebral haemorrhage 4, ischemic stroke 3). Overall 29 organs (27 kidneys, 2 livers) were retrieved and transplanted to 29 patients with mean age 55.3 ± 9.76 years.
